title: Buffalo National River: River Accesses
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outdoor Activities     Floating     River Accesses                  Put-Ins       The Put-In is where you access the river.  The Reach is a term used to describe a section of the river. The reach you select will be defined by your put-in and take-out locations. Each reach has its own beauty and challenges.  A chart of the mileage between river accesses may be found here.  Remember that river travel is not strictly a miles-per-hour undertaking since different reaches have different flows and impediments.
